attributes.action: Tougher sentencing for pedophiles and child rapists
attributes.additional_details: As a nation we want tougher sentencing for all of the above. Some are getting 27 months for having indecent images of children, that’s not justice, nothing will ever be justice for these sick individuals. They deserve to be in prison for life. No child should ever suffer abuse and feel like there predator is roaming free. The sentencing needs looking at and changing. These people destroy children’s lives.
attributes.background: We want tougher sentencing for pedophiles/child rapist/child abusers, having indecent images of children, anything to do with harming innocent children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review punishment of Child Sex Offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746131
